text: Hi <!everyone>! Hope you are all hanging in there as the semester begins to wrap up. We are hoping to plan a virtual OSSSG end of semester social sometime in December. We have not finalized a plan yet but depending on interest we are imagining that we will do some socializing and/or play games over a virtual platform. Please fill out the Doodle poll below by *Monday December 7th* so we can find a time where most people are available! Also, feel free to suggest ideas for different activities/games we could play. Thanks! <https://doodle.com/poll/ub9tgq2rxydm5yx3?utm_source=poll&utm_medium=link>

attachments.title: Doodle: OSSSG End of Semester Social
attachments.text: Doodle is the simplest way to schedule meetings with clients, colleagues, or friends. Find the best time for one-to-ones and team meetings with our user-friendly calendar tool. Get started today!
attachments.fallback: Doodle: OSSSG End of Semester Social
